message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. Is that something you'd consider?
